title: Keith Lemon says knowing Scary past keeps Celebrity Juice captain Mel B in check
text:

I’ve got I’ve got Mel B as a new team captain on Celebrity Juice next week. And she’s not that Scary when you know all her secrets... like how she used to pinch cash at work.

We are both from Leeds and knew each other before we got famous so it helps keeping her in check on the show knowing I’ve got all the dirt.

Me and Mel B are like brother and sister who bicker with each other.

I know her from back when she used to work in a jeans shop when she used to steal tenners out of the till.

So I’m not scared of her because I know her background and she knows my background.

(Image: Adam Gerrard/Daily Mirror)

We have a connection because we know each other from before we were on telly or in a pop band.

I always tell people s***. I say stuff and she goes: “Why did you say that for?” Don’t tell me anything or I’ll tell everyone, I go, “You do too”, and she’s like, “I’m honest!” But so am I!

She’s more like Scary Spice on a night out. She is very honest.

She’ll go about certain people, “Look at her! She’s the same age as us, isn’t she?”, I’m like, “Jesus, man!”

But she is just being honest!

(Image: ITV)

Every time she’s been naughty she just says, “I’m being honest!” Mel has replaced Paddy McGuinness as team captain and is up against Holly Willoughby – and Holly may have met her match.

They are both really competitive. I mean, Scary Spice is Scary Spice so she’s got something to prove and Holly’s renowned for being competitive – and she is.

We’ve got a game called box ­mountain and I swear at one point Holly had her hand inside Mel’s mouth trying to get over her.

Mel said that she nearly pulled her weave off.

So they are both going against each other – I can see it getting heated.

We’ve recorded four shows already and I think Mel’s won the most so far. Holly will pull it back – she will.
description: EXCLUSIVE: Mel B is the new team captain on ITV 2's Celebrity Juice and Keith Lemon says he has a naughty history with the star...
